00016 - (CPArray)themeNames

00020 
00021 - (void)viewsForDefaultTheme
00022 {
00023     var views = [],
00024         bundle = [CPBundle mainBundle];
00025 
00026     // Horizontal Slider
00027         
00028     var horizontalTrackColor = [CPColor colorWithPatternImage:[[CPThreePartImage alloc] initWithImageSlices:
00029         [
00030             [_CPCibCustomResource imageResourceWithName:"horizontal-track-left.png" size:CPSizeMake(2.0, 4.0)],
00031             [_CPCibCustomResource imageResourceWithName:"horizontal-track-center.png" size:CPSizeMake(1.0, 4.0)],
00032             [_CPCibCustomResource imageResourceWithName:"horizontal-track-right.png" size:CPSizeMake(2.0, 4.0)]
00033         ]
00034         isVertical:NO]];
00035 
00036     var horizontalSlider = [[CPSlider alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(0.0, 0.0, 50.0, 24.0)];
00037     
00038     [horizontalSlider setTrackWidth:4.0];
00039     [horizontalSlider setHorizontalTrackColor:horizontalTrackColor];
00040 
00041     var knobColor = [CPColor colorWithPatternImage:[_CPCibCustomResource imageResourceWithName:"knob.png" size:CPSizeMake(11.0, 11.0)]];
00042         knobHighlightedColor = [CPColor colorWithPatternImage:[_CPCibCustomResource imageResourceWithName:"knob-highlighted.png" size:CPSizeMake(12.0, 12.0)]];
00043 
00044     [horizontalSlider setKnobSize:CGSizeMake(12.0, 12.0)];
00045     [horizontalSlider setKnobColor:knobColor];
00046     [horizontalSlider setKnobColor:knobHighlightedColor forControlState:CPControlStateHighlighted];  
00047 
00048     views.push(horizontalSlider);
00049     
00050     // Vertical Slider
00051     
00052     var verticalTrackColor =  [CPColor colorWithPatternImage:[[CPThreePartImage alloc] initWithImageSlices:
00053         [
00054             [_CPCibCustomResource imageResourceWithName:"vertical-track-top.png" size:CPSizeMake(4.0, 2.0)],
00055             [_CPCibCustomResource imageResourceWithName:"vertical-track-center.png" size:CPSizeMake(4.0, 1.0)],
00056             [_CPCibCustomResource imageResourceWithName:"vertical-track-bottom.png" size:CPSizeMake(4.0, 2.0)]
00057         ]
00058         isVertical:YES]];
00059     
00060     var verticalSlider = [[CPSlider alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(0.0, 0.0, 24.0, 50.0)];
00061 
00062     [verticalSlider setTrackWidth:4];
00063     [verticalSlider setVerticalTrackColor:verticalTrackColor];
00064 
00065     [verticalSlider setKnobSize:CGSizeMake(12.0, 12.0)];
00066     [verticalSlider setKnobColor:knobColor];
00067     [verticalSlider setKnobColor:knobHighlightedColor forControlState:CPControlStateHighlighted];  
00068     
00069     views.push(verticalSlider);
00070     
00071     return views;
00072 }

00074 - (void)applicationDidFinishLaunching:(CPNotification)aNotification
00075 {
00076     var theWindow = [[CPWindow alloc] initWithContentRect:CGRectMakeZero() styleMask:CPBorderlessBridgeWindowMask],
00077         contentView = [theWindow contentView],
00078         bounds = [contentView bounds],
00079         themeNames = [self themeNames],
00080         index = 0,
00081         count = themeNames.length;
00082         
00083     var tabView = [[CPTabView alloc] initWithFrame:bounds];
00084     
00085     [tabView setAutoresizingMask:CPViewWidthSizable | CPViewHeightSizable];
00086     
00087     [contentView addSubview:tabView];
00088     
00089     for (; index < count; ++index)
00090     {
00091         var item = [[CPTabViewItem alloc] initWithIdentifier:themeNames[index]],
00092             selectorName = "viewsFor" + themeNames[index] + "Theme",
00093             views = [self performSelector:selectorName],
00094             viewsCount = [views count],
00095             itemSize = CGSizeMake(0.0, 0.0);
00096             
00097         while (viewsCount--)
00098         {
00099             var size = [views[viewsCount] frame].size;
00100             
00101             if (size.width > itemSize.width)
00102                 itemSize.width = size.width;
00103             
00104             if (size.height > itemSize.height)
00105                 itemSize.height = size.height;
00106         }
00107         
00108         itemSize.height += 30;
00109         itemSize.width += 40;
00110         
00111         var collectionView = [[CPCollectionView alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMakeZero()],
00112             collectionViewItem = [[CPCollectionViewItem alloc] init];
00113             
00114         [collectionViewItem setView:[[ThemedView alloc] init]];
00115 
00116         [collectionView setItemPrototype:collectionViewItem];
00117         [collectionView setMinItemSize:itemSize];
00118         [collectionView setMaxItemSize:itemSize];
00119         [collectionView setVerticalMargin:5.0];
00120         [collectionView setContent:views];
00121         
00122         [item setLabel:themeNames[index]];
00123         [item setView:collectionView];
00124 
00125         [tabView addTabViewItem:item];
00126     }
00127 
00128     [theWindow orderFront:self];
00129 }

00133 @implementation ThemedView : CPView
00134 {
00135     CPView      _view;
00136     CPTextField _label;
00137 }
00138 
00139 - (void)setRepresentedObject:(id)anObject
00140 {
00141     if (!_label)
00142     {
00143         _label = [[CPTextField alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMakeZero()];
00144         
00145         [_label setAlignment:CPCenterTextAlignment];
00146         [_label setAutoresizingMask:CPViewMinYMargin | CPViewWidthSizable];
00147         [_label setFont:[CPFont boldSystemFontOfSize:12.0]];
00148         
00149         [self addSubview:_label];
00150     }
00151     
00152     [_label setStringValue:[anObject className]];
00153     [_label sizeToFit];
00154     
00155     [_label setFrame:CGRectMake(0.0, CGRectGetHeight([self bounds]) - CGRectGetHeight([_label frame]), 
00156         CGRectGetWidth([self bounds]), CGRectGetHeight([_label frame]))];
00157     
00158     if (_view)
00159         [_view removeFromSuperview];
00160         
00161     _view = anObject;
00162     
00163     [_view setAutoresizingMask:CPViewMinXMargin | CPViewMaxXMargin | CPViewMinYMargin | CPViewMaxYMargin];
00164     [_view setFrameOrigin:CGPointMake((CGRectGetWidth([self bounds]) - CGRectGetWidth([_view frame])) / 2.0, (CGRectGetMinY([_label frame]) - CGRectGetHeight([_view frame])) / 2.0)];
00165     
00166     [self addSubview:_view];
00167 }
